title: The Cigar Authority Cleans Up!
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority Cleans Up!
description: Fred Smith from Smithfest releases for the first time the amount that Smithfest raised this year for  children's charities totalling $50,000!  John Sullivan teaches us how to clean smoke out of the air, your clothes and your cars.  And the Doctor is in the house as Dr. Lou Rodriguez, ER Physician, releases his own cigar proving once again the medical industry endorses cigar smoking worldwide.  We light up the C+C Corojo and Room 101 Namakubia.  It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for the Cigar Authority.
